doc.after: Esperanto is by far the most widely spoken constructed language in the world.[57] Speakers are most numerous in Europe and East Asia, especially in urban areas, where they often form Esperanto clubs.[58] Esperanto is particularly prevalent in the northern and central countries of Europe; in China, Korea, Japan, and Iran within Asia;[24] in Brazil, Argentina, and Mexico in the Americas;[2] and in Togo in Africa.[59]
